quote: Positivity is a connectivity between Heart-to-Heart and not Mind-to-Mind as that is only equal Profitability.
author: Anuj Somany

quote: Positivity is such a high predicator of success rates.
author: Shawn Achor

quote: With no positivity, there is no hope; with no negativity, there is no improvement.
author: Criss Jami,  Healology

quote: Every negative...Has a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: Objectivity allows you the luxury of not taking sides
author: Garrett McCoy

quote: Its a mathematical fact that two negatives make a positive so even under adverse circumstances think positively.
author: Amit Abraham,  Personality Development Through Positive Thinking

quote: Happiness is good, but well-overrated: what we hate most are the very motivators that put us in gear. A man drifts along with little to contribute until something agitates him enough to make a difference, whether for himself or for his communities.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: When we carry the thoughts of negativity and self-criticism, we inspire just what we don’t want: poor health and an unattractive physical body.
author: Dashama Konah Gordon,  Journey to Joyful: Transform Your Life with Pranashama Yoga

quote: Every negative...Jas a positive side...
author: Nelson M. Lubao

quote: Happiness is not something you pursue, it is a state of mind and a feeling of positivity, within.
author: Amitav Chowdhury

quote: Positive energy is attracted to positive energy.
author: Deborah Day

quote: If you see the world and yourself through a lens smudged by negativity then you’ll find much misery. If you look outwards and inwards through lens brightened by positivity you’ll find much to be happy and appreciative about.
author: Henrik Edberg,  The 7 Timeless Habits of Happiness

quote: I don't like any kind of negativity. I try to be good to everyone, whether it's a love, a friend, an ex. I'll always try to treat people the way I want to be treated.
author: Nina Dobrev

quote: Some good can emerge from the most horrific of events. There is something positive hidden in every negative, and something negative in every positive. Life is complicated, and a balanced person can see both sides.
author: Amish Tripathi,  Scion of Ikshvaku

quote: The positive emotions that arise in...unpromising circumstances demonstrate that social ties and meaningful work are deeply desired, readily improvised, and intensely rewarding. The very structure of our economy and society prevent these goals from being achieved.
author: Rebecca Solnit

quote: Problems are inevitable. Happiness is optional.
author: Maddy Malhotra,  How to Build Self-Esteem and Be Confident: Overcome Fears, Break Habits, Be Successful and Happy

quote: Negative actions cannot create a positive life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: The pleasure of criticizing takes away from us the pleasure of being moved by some very fine things.
author: Jean de La Bruyère

quote: Last weekend a young man asked me how I remain so positive. “It seems all the negativity in the world doesn’t affect you,” he said. I had no more than a minute with the young man so I offered this: It’s all about where you choose to put your attention, and I choose to be happy.
author: Jason Mraz

quote: The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts: therefore, guard accordingly, and take care that you entertain no notions unsuitable to virtue and reasonable nature.
author: Marcus Aurelius,  Meditations

quote: You cannot have a positive life and a negative mind.
author: Joyce Meyer

quote: Being negative only makes a difficult journey more difficult. You may be given a cactus, but you don't have to sit on it.
author: Joyce Meyer,  Approval Addiction: Overcoming Your Need to Please Everyone

quote: Whatever negative things people think and say about you is enough to bring you down provided you belief that it carries a weight that can push you hard. Don't agree to accept what critics say; be prepared to silence them by doing what they think you can't do!
author: Israelmore Ayivor,  The Great Hand Book of Quotes

quote: The creed which accepts as the foundation of morals, Utility, or the Greatest-Happiness Principle, holds that actions are right in proportion as they tend to promote happiness, wrong as they tend to produce the reverse of happiness. By happiness is intended pleasure, and the absence of pain; by unhappiness, pain, and the privation of pleasure.
author: John Stuart Mill,  Utilitarianism

quote: A pessimist is a man who thinks everybody is as nasty as himself, and hates them for it.
author: George Bernard Shaw

quote: When you think a positive thought, you become positive.
author: Steve Backley,  The Champion in all of Us: 12 Rules for Success

quote: Accepting the reality of change gives rise to equanimity.
author: Allan Lokos,  Pocket Peace: Effective Practices for Enlightened Living

quote: Happiness is not a matter of intensity but of balance, order, rhythm and harmony.
author: Orison Swett Marden

quote: An attitude of positive expectation is the mark of the superior personality.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: The trouble is that we have a bad habit, encouraged by pedants and sophisticates, of considering happiness as something rather stupid. Only pain is intellectual, only evil interesting. This is the treason of the artist; a refusal to admit the banality of evil and the terrible boredom of pain.
author: Ursula K. Le Guin,  The Ones Who Walk Away from Omelas

quote: Dislike in yourself what you dislike in others.
author: Hazrat Ali Ibn Abu-Talib A.S

quote: We often concentrate on the negative side of humanity. However, humanity is growing and maturing everyday and showing signs of a better future.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If goodness has causes, it is not goodness; if it has effects, a reward, it is not goodness either. So goodness is outside the chain of cause and effect.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quote: Never let negativity derail your journey as a writer. Use the energy for your own betterment.
author: Guadalupe Neri

quote: I'm taking all the negatives in my life, and turning them into a positive.
author: Pitbull

quote: All who consult on doubtful matters, should be void of hatred, friendship, anger, and pity.
author: Sallust

quote: It is my observations, though, that happiness limits the amount of suffering one is willing to inflict upon others
author: Jacqueline Carey,  Kushiel's Dart

quote: If you envy successful people, you create a negative force field of attraction that repels you from ever doing the things that you need to do to be successful. If you admire successful people, you create a positive force field of attraction that draws you toward becoming more and more like the kinds of people that you want to be like.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Happiness is inseparably connected with decent, clean behavior.
author: Boyd K. Packer

quote: The devil's happy when the critics run you off.
author: Criss Jami,  Venus in Arms

quote: Often, moreover, it is...that aspect of our being that society finds eccentric, ridiculous, or disagreeable, that holds our sweet waters, our secret well of happiness, the key to our equanimity in malevolent climes.
author: Tom Robbins,  Still Life with Woodpecker

quote: The motive behind criticism often determines its validity. Those who care criticize where necessary. Those who envy criticize the moment they think that they have found a weak spot.
author: Criss Jami,  Killosophy

quote: We are constituted so that simple acts of kindness, such as giving to charity or expressing gratitude, have a positive effect on our long-term moods. The key to the happy life, it seems, is the good life: a life with sustained relationships, challenging work, and connections to community.
author: Paul Bloom

quote: All those who offer an opinion on any doubtful point should first clear their minds of every sentiment of dislike, friendship, anger or pity.
author: Sallust

quote: Life is too short to spend in negativity. So I have made a conscious effort to not be where I don't want to be.
author: Hugh Dillon

quote: The secret of happiness is to face the fact that the world is horrible, horrible, horrible.
author: Bertrand Russell

quote: Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
author: Joel Osteen

quote: When we replace a sense of service and gratitude with a sense of entitlement and expectation, we quickly see the demise of our relationships, society, and economy.
author: Steve Maraboli,  Unapologetically You: Reflections on Life and the Human Experience

quote: When we are unhurried and wise, we perceive that only great and worthy things have any permanent and absolute existence, that petty fears and petty pleasures are but the shadow of the reality.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: Unhappiness is bondage; therefore, happiness is freedom.
author: Lauren Oliver,  Delirium
